info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
info.description:
At 330 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Azle to near Benbrook to Godley. Movement was east at 45 mph.
HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects.
Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fort Worth, Burleson, Cleburne, Benbrook, Saginaw, White Settlement, Crowley, Forest Hill, River Oaks, and Everman around 335 AM CST. Arlington, Haltom City, Watauga, Kennedale, Keene, Rendon, North Richland Hills, and Cross Timber around 340 AM CST. Mansfield, Keller, Hurst, Richland Hills, and Pantego around 345 AM CST. Euless, Bedford, Southlake, Colleyville, and Alvarado around 350 AM CST. Grand Prairie, Grapevine, Trophy Club, and DFW Intl Airport around 355 AM CST. Dallas, Irving, Flower Mound, Cedar Hill, Coppell, Midlothian, and Cedar Hill State Park around 400 AM CST. Lewisville, Duncanville, and Cockrell Hill around 405 AM CST. Carrollton, Desoto, Farmers Branch, Glenn Heights, Ovilla, Hebron, and Dallas Love Field around 410 AM CST.
Other locations impacted by these storms include Joe Pool Lake, Sand Branch, Mountain Creek Lake, Rockett, Egan, Bristol, Pecan Hill, Grapevine Lake, Lake Arlington, and India.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 24 and 69. Interstate 35E between mile markers 400 and 452. Interstate 20 between mile markers 421 and 485. Interstate 30 between mile markers 1 and 63. Interstate 45 between mile markers 258 and 284.
info.instruction:
If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

parameter.value: Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Johnson, southern Denton, eastern Parker, Tarrant, northern Ellis, southwestern Collin and Dallas Counties through 430 AM CST

area.areaDesc: Denton; Collin; Parker; Tarrant; Dallas; Johnson; Ellis
